features: Take care of your skin: We set out to reduce the use of plastics and exposure to harsh chemicals. Our newly developed product, laundry tablets - Free of dyes, chlorine, phosphates or optical brighteners. Ingredients include: coconut oil, surfactants, plant extracts and essential oils. It not only works efficiently, but also dissolves quickly in hot and cold water. It not only gets rid of stains with incredible cleaning power but, more importantly, protects your delicate skin.

Take it with you anytime - 240 pre-processed laundry strips, no measuring required. Say goodbye to heavy plastic jugs and pods, easy to pick up recyclable packaging and pollution-free lightweight laundry tablets for your home, dorm or travel life.

Your clothes will love these: We made this liquid free hypoallergenic laundry detergent to soften and reduce wrinkles and eliminate odors, stains, and dirt. Our high efficiency laundry detergent tablets are ideal for everyday laundry. It's formulated to better penetrate into and between fibers to dissolve and remove body oils and others nasties you may not even be able to see and It's also safe for whites and all colors, and you can use it in hot, cold, hard, or soft water.

Eco Friendly: Eco friendly laundry detergent sheets ticked all of the following boxes: vegan, cruelty-free, eco-friendly, plastic-free, minimalist. No more giant plastic bottles and nothing in the landfill!
Earth Village: Giving back is a core part of who we are. A percentage of each order goes to World Wide Fund for Nature. Let's work together to preserve our common home: the Earth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 240 SHEETS=240 SMALL LOADS=120 LARGE LOADS. 1 SMALL LOAD=0.05 USD. Economical! Large Quantity Laundry Detergent Sheets, unlike other brand which only 30 to 48 sheets in on pack, we have 240 sheets on pack and you don't worry if you have a lot of large loads laundry to wash but lack of clothes washer sheets detergent. 240 Sheets Laundry Detergent Strips, the quantity of it can meet your daily laundry life and always keep your clothes clean and soft! Equal to 240 Small Loads, pre-cut eco detergent sheets, you don't need to tear off by yourself if you only need for a small load of clothes. Equal to 120 Large Loads, if you need for large load clothes, just throw 2 sheets into the washer. 2 sheets equal 1 large loads.

Plastic Free Package All detergent sheets are pack in one package and with Plastic-free sealing stickers. 100% reusable package and do no harm to our planet. Hypoallergenic Laundry Strips Made of plant-based ingredients without harmful chemicals or plastics. They are non-toxic, free from dye/paraben and hypoallergenic. Safe for you and everyone in the family. A Deeper Clean Power Believe it or not, even the best detergents may not be able to remove all the dirt and stains trapped deep within items in your washload. So clothes and bedding that look clean may not be. Wow! That's where Sheets come in handy. It's formulated to better penetrate into and between the fibers, dissolving and removing body oils and other dirt you can't even see. No Harm Washer Sheets Using natural, plant-based ingredients and contain no harmful chemicals or plastics,Our green laundry detergent sheets-zero waste, zero plastic-just the good stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, works great, easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Love these! Plastic-free, smell great, economical and they do a great job cleaning my clothes. I usually use 1 or 2, depending on whether it's a small or medium load. My previously over-crowded laundry counter now consists of a small box of these laundry sheets & a basket of 6 dryer balls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product and Value!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for several months and really like it. It dissolves nicely, smells good and cleans the laundry well. It's a great value, not just for the money, but because it's a quality product and priced well. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clean laundry and no skin irritation
reviews.reviewText: I love these laundry sheets! They get the job done and do not cause irritation like some laundry products do! I gave it four stars for weak scent but I don’t want to smell like laundry soap anyway!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an item I ordered again
reviews.reviewText: I liked this product and the price point enough that this is now a staple in the house. Does a great job cleaning and the smell is nice but doesn't hit you in the face like "dang you just did laundry I can smell you"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan of the scent
reviews.reviewText: I have used a different brand of detergent sheets in the past and wanted to see what else is on the market. First off, I thought I was getting the amount listed in rectangular sheets the size of what you imagine a box of dryer sheets is. These are half size sheets. Which is fine, just not what was expected. They clean my laundry well but I just don’t love the scent. Smells like some cheap cleaner I’d buy to mop floors with on my clothes and towels. Won’t be buying these again just because of the smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had to move to a senior facility, but I’ve used detergent sheets for many years, and I love them. I’ve passed them out to all my friends here, and they really love them too. They are so convenient to use. They’re so much easier to store, they are certainly lighter than detergent bottles and you don’t really need as much soap as you find in pods.I actually ordered these for my 99 year old friend who loves them, but doesn’t really use any kind of smart media and couldn’t order them for herself. My other friends all are capable of getting them themselves and I will order them for myself again when I run low.This brand seems like the best value.I gave a box to my grandson to use in college so he wouldn’t have to carry a heavy detergent bottle to the laundry room in his dorm. I’ll give him some more when he returns in the fall since he’s actually using them!They are also the easiest thing to take when you travel just put some in a Ziploc bag. You can cut them or tear them and just have enough soap for a sink full of clothes or a bathtub if you wantI really recommend detergent sheets for everyone they are good for the environment because they don’t come in a big plastic bottle or a plastic container and they get totally used up in the wash. I don’t notice a scent and while I don’t think I’m particularly sensitive I do think I’d notice if I felt itchy,etc but I don’t.Don’t hesitate to buy these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cleaning power and no powerful scents
reviews.reviewText: These sheets are great. No residue on clothes or the machine, no spills around the laundry room or gummy buildup from those terrible pods. There is no fake laundry scent, but the laundry does have a fresh smell when done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints here
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy these are to use and no residue left behind like it sometimes happens with pods. The smell is nice and I plan to order more!
